description:
Experienced And Honest Lawyers In Philadelphia

Ciccarelli Law Offices has provided skilled legal counsel in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, since 1999. Today, we represent clients in personal injury cases, criminal matters, divorce, family law cases, estate planning, civil litigation and more.

When you need a lawyer you can feel confident in, turn to our law firm. Our founding attorney, Lee A. Ciccarelli, has received much recognition for his accomplishments. He is recognized as:

  • A Main Line Top Lawyer in personal injury law and criminal defense law
  • A Top 100 Trial Lawyer by The National Trial Lawyers Association
  • A Top 100 Litigation Attorney by the American Society of Legal Advocates
  • A Superb-rated attorney through Avvo, receiving the service's highest rating (10.0)

A Team Of Skilled, Hardworking Attorneys On Your Side

Mr. Ciccarelli leads our law firm, where most of our cases are handled by a team of lawyers, who have more than 60 years of combined legal experience. When you work with our law office, you may benefit from having multiple skilled attorneys — including experienced negotiators and trial veterans — contributing to your case.

Our "blue collar values" include working hard for our clients and charging reasonable fees. In personal injury cases, we often charge no lawyer's fees unless we recover compensation for our clients. To learn more about our fees and how our team can help you with your legal concerns, please call 717-925-8654 and schedule a free consultation with Ciccarelli Law Offices today.
